sentences.english: The hooligan stood leaning against the wall, cigarette between lips and scar on face.
sentences.chinese: 流氓斜倚着墙站着，嘴里叼根烟，脸上一个刀疤。

sentences.english: Thinking on the pillow of his hand, with poem and tea.
sentences.chinese: 且看他，斜倚沙发手当枕，一卷诗书一杯茶。

sentences.english: The ancient simple pile-dwellings of Miao lie on the green slopes.
sentences.chinese: 古朴的吊角楼斜倚在绿色的山坡上。

sentences.english: She was leaning negligently against the wall.
Front and Rear seat could recline position.
It glided noiselessly towards the recumbent woman.
sentences.chinese: 它无声无息地向那斜倚着的女人走去。

sentences.english: The people simply lean over the large rocks that separate the road from the water.
sentences.chinese: 人们只是斜倚在隔开海陆的大岩石上。

sentences.english: The elm reclining figures are exceptional.
sentences.chinese: 那件榆木的斜倚木雕是特殊的。

sentences.english: It shows a beautiful woman lying on a couch smoking her cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 节目画面上有一个美貌女子斜倚在长沙发上吸香烟。

sentences.english: The hooligan stood leaning against the wall, with a cigarette between his lips and a scar on his face.
sentences.chinese: 流氓斜倚着墙站着，嘴里叼着一根烟，脸上一个刀疤。

sentences.english: Leaning her breast against the reedy shore.
If you slouch in your chair the interviewer will think you could be sloppy in your work as well.
sentences.chinese: 你斜倚在椅子里，面试官会在工作上你也会拖沓松散。

sentences.english: Leaned out, leaning, hushing the room enclosed.
sentences.chinese: 探出身来，斜倚着，使紧闭的房间一片静寂。

sentences.english: And on my leaning shoulder she lay her snow-white hand.
sentences.chinese: 她那只雪白的小手搭着我斜倚的肩。

sentences.english: He leaned back against the tree to take out his knife.
sentences.chinese: 他斜倚在树上，准备掏刀子。

sentences.english: The ancient Diaojiao Lou is reclining on green slopes.
sentences.chinese: 古朴的吊角楼斜倚在绿色的山坡上。

definition: to doze/to take a nap/nodding off to sleep
